description: T.1 Yew - reduce crown by 2m and produce a final height 7-8m and width 5-6m. T.2 Hornbeam - reduce by 2m to previous points and produce a final height 5m and width 2m T.3 Conifers - trim the front along the side of the houseT.4 Conifers - crown reduction by 30% (2m) and trim front and sides and produce a final height 5-6m and width 6-7m T.5 Robinia - reduce to previous points and produce a final height 5-6m and width 3m T.6 Conifer front hedge - reduce height by 3-4m and produce a final height 4-5m and width 5m
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
